subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. turned down a third appeal by the University of Connecticut for a waiver of academic requirements, meaning the team may not play in next year’s postseason tournament.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. turned down a third appeal by the University of Connecticut for a waiver of academic requirements, meaning the team may not play in next year’s postseason tournament.
